overview: Lyle Reimer is about to put the finishing touch on his latest art piece, taking recycled trash and glueing it all to his face, revealing Lyle XOX. While in Vancouver, he's preparing for a big shoot in Tokyo, that will set in motion the launch of his book and window display at Bergdorf-Goodman in New York City. Throughout this journey to fame, Lyle is reminded of the past, and needs to connect with it, his family, his friends, and his childhood in rural Saskatchewan in order to make peace and move on.
title: Random Is My Favourite Colour
